explains: adj. 错综复杂的；难理解的，难学会的

sentences.en: He knows his way around the intricate maze of patent law.
sentences.cn: 他通晓错综复杂的专利法。

sentences.en: You develop in-depth knowledge of the intricate structure of the language.
sentences.cn: 你对复杂的语言结构有更深入的了解。

sentences.en: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.cn: 运河的小堵塞或崩塌会阻塞错综复杂的灌溉网络。
